title: Micro freezing when starting video recording.
content: Hi all! Does anyone has this problem with video recording on Pixel 3 XL? On 1 sec, after camera started you can see small freeze. This bug happens only if I open camera from scratch. If I open from RAM all is ok. Link to video: https://photos.app.goo.gl/Pc9gBdKdGc54Y61v9
